comment._content: one of 5 British battleships hit by heavy fire at Jutland, she was not impaired. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_Colossus_(1910)

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content:
The Germans call the sea battle "Skagerrak." (Skaggerak is a body of water.)
The British call the sea battle "Jutland." (Jutland is a peninsula.)
Interesting difference in points of view. Both claimed victory as well.
